name: Punished Talents: Seven Muses HD - A Hidden Objects, Adventure & Mystery Game
name_original: Punished Talents: Seven Muses HD - A Hidden Objects, Adventure & Mystery Game
description:
Play a FREE trial of this immersive, high-quality game! Then pay once & play forever offline!

Enter Boston in the 1930s. Your husband, a successful writer, has been implicated in a series of murders. You’ll need to track down the real murderer, prove your husband’s innocence, and save future targets in this intriguing mystery.

• SAVE YOUR HUSBAND!
Suspicion has fallen on your husband, Robert. The crimes mirror those described in his books, exactly. Discover the truth and clear Robert’s name.

• SAVE YOUR FRIENDS!
The murderer has been targeting those you hold near and dear. It’s up to you to deduce who is next so you can save the day.

• SAVE YOURSELF!
You’re up against an intelligent and dangerous foe. Be very careful as you search for clues, or you may find yourself in some big trouble.

• UNLOCK THIS FANTASTIC COLLECTOR’S EDITION TO FIND OUT WHODUNIT!
Explore the streets of Chicago in the fascinating bonus game. Take a step behind the scenes with the lovely wallpapers and concept art in this fantastic Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure.
